actions.committee: Committee on Education and the Workforce, and in addition to the Committee on Science, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned

Referred to House Education and the Workforce

actions.subcommittee: Postsecondary Education, Training and Life-Long Learning
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Postsecondary Education, Training and Life-Long Learning.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Postsecondary Education, Training and Life-Long Learning

official_title: Expressing the sense of the Congress that Federal funding for elementary and secondary teacher training be used first for science scholarships for elementary and secondary teachers.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of Congress that all local educational agencies receiving Federal funding for elementary and secondary teacher training or certification are encouraged to use such funding first for science scholarships for teachers.

titles.title: Expressing the sense of the Congress that Federal funding for elementary and secondary teacher training be used first for science scholarships for elementary and secondary teachers.
